channel.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
channel.description:
[b]Hey fellow Mopar Community, Today I would like to announce that Extrodia has came into its beta stage in the making. We would love for you to join us on the journey of beta to help us find our bug/glitches. Extrodia has already been in development for 4 months and we are striving to developing it more and adding more content for our players. Please part-take in our forums to view what upcoming updates we are gonna do for Extrodia!
Our Forums are a fully integrated IPB which will allow our user for easy access around the forums for a better visibility of what's going on. 99% Up-time on both forums and Server!
We have just purchased a VPS which we can hold 200+players online. Of course as of we are Online for the Public to come into the beta world and help us find the bugs/glitches faster so we can Go live by the release date July 25, 2014! [/b]
[u][i][b]Kind Regards, Mod Vee Extrodia Owner[/b][/i][/u]
[center][b][i][u]Features:
What does Extrodia have to offer? -All Skills Fully Functional -Flasks -Bank Pins -Summoning -Bossing -Optimized Player Killing -Barrows -Warriors Guild -Custom Minigames (Added weekly, for events that we have).. Every week or two we'll have a different minigame added from scratch. -Treasure Trails -Plenty of monsters to kill for things like Steads, Glaivens, and Ragefires. -Full Screen Option -Completionist cape to reach once you Max out completely (Adding Customization features soon) -Npc and Projectile Clipping -B.O.B (Beast of Burden's) for storing during bossing and or pking. -Updated npc models, barrows, etc. -Good combat (will be improved) -Functional Pouch Infusing and Scroll Infusing for Summoning [/u][/i][/b][/center]
[center]Forums:[url=http://www.extrodia.com]www.extrodia.com[/url][/center] [center]Extrodia JAR Client:[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/k23gb3w2gmcapjn/ExtrodiaBeta.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/k23gb3w2gmcapjn/ExtrodiaBeta.jar[/url][/center]
[center]MEDIA: Modern GFX Colored Whips! [img]http://puu.sh/afWlp/5359281ead.png[/img] Full Working Warriors Guild! [img]http://puu.sh/afWmR/8454f651e9.png[/img]
Fullscreen Re-Sizable HD Client! [img]http://puu.sh/afWoZ/970907b0c5.png[/img][/center]
Full Working Fight Pits! [IMG]http://puu.sh/aiaXa/b4ba82a0ef.png[/img]

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I looked at both accounts and the IP’s don’t match. However its possible he could have used a proxy to create both accounts. I’ll keep an eye on this thread and if any suspicious activity occurs I’ll deal with it accordingly.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:545125”][quote author=Camballer link=topic=664007.msg4438561#msg4438561 date=1405826358]
It’s not your responsibility to spot people who bump their own posts, because you don’t have the true ability to do so. The download looks clean and some people might actually like this server, who knows.
[/quote]
No, it’s not my job. But it helps the mods with their job since they cannot be everywhere at once. (hence the invention of the “Report to moderator” button).
The only point of me saying what I did about the account used to bump, is it’s directly against the rules to make a second account to bump posts.[/quote]

Ok, it’s not worth arguing about sorry. I’m sure they appreciate the help. Sorry if I came off as a douche.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Camballer:

It’s not your responsibility to spot people who bump their own posts, because you don’t have the true ability to do so. The download looks clean and some people might actually like this server, who knows.

No, it’s not my job. But it helps the mods with their job since they cannot be everywhere at once. (hence the invention of the “Report to moderator” button).
The only point of me saying what I did about the account used to bump, is it’s directly against the rules to make a second account to bump posts.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Death Style, post:5, topic:545125”]happens kind of often sk8r

sometimes i think it’s just a really dedicated player[/quote]
Mate he didn’t even say he was a player, He joined barley after the advert was even made.

I can’t do too much “investigating” myself since I don’t have access to the IP’s of people etc but it’s way more fishy than when someone joins and bumps after the advert has been around for a few days. And typically they say they’re either part of it or something like it, check out Guilds of Veldahar, that’s what I’m talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:


Hmm. There’s something fishy about this account. What could that be…

He only has one post, and it happens to be on this thread. He was also registered a few minutes after the OP made his post and posted soon thereafter.

This person either makes up his mind really fast, or doesn’t exist because it’s the OP.
Some new information has just hit my table

Looks like OP himself registered minutes before even making this topic.
While that doesn’t matter, it seems to build onto the suspicion of the post by Matthew18 is, in fact, illegitimate.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Extrodia RSPS
item.dc:creator: @veesi veesi
item.description:
@veesi wrote:

[b]Hey fellow Mopar Community, Today I would like to announce that Extrodia has came into its beta stage in the making. We would love for you to join us on the journey of beta to help us find our bug/glitches. Extrodia has already been in development for 4 months and we are striving to developing it more and adding more content for our players. Please part-take in our forums to view what upcoming updates we are gonna do for Extrodia!

Our Forums are a fully integrated IPB which will allow our user for easy access around the forums for a better visibility of what’s going on. 99% Up-time on both forums and Server!

We have just purchased a VPS which we can hold 200+players online. Of course as of we are Online for the Public to come into the beta world and help us find the bugs/glitches faster so we can Go live by the release date July 25, 2014! [/b]

Kind Regards, Mod Vee Extrodia Owner

[center][b][i][u]Features:

What does Extrodia have to offer?
-All Skills Fully Functional
-Flasks
-Bank Pins
-Summoning
-Bossing
-Optimized Player Killing
-Barrows
-Warriors Guild
-Custom Minigames (Added weekly, for events that we have)… Every week or two we’ll have a different minigame added from scratch.
-Treasure Trails
-Plenty of monsters to kill for things like Steads, Glaivens, and Ragefires.
-Full Screen Option
-Completionist cape to reach once you Max out completely (Adding Customization features soon)
-Npc and Projectile Clipping
-B.O.B (Beast of Burden’s) for storing during bossing and or pking.
-Updated npc models, barrows, etc.
-Good combat (will be improved)
-Functional Pouch Infusing and Scroll Infusing for Summoning
[/u][/i][/b][/center]

[center]Forums:www.extrodia.com[/center]

Modern GFX Colored Whips!

Full Working Warriors Guild!
